digest.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
digest.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
digest.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to understand new information, especially when there is a lot of it or it is difficult to understand
digest.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I struggled to digest the news.
digest.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a short piece of writing that gives the most important facts from a book, report etc
